keyMoments.title: Complete Straw Hat Crew Assembly at Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: All six Straw Hat members present at Enies Lobby (Luffy, Zoro, Sanji, Nami, Chopper, and Sogeking) stand united on the courthouse roof, facing Robin and CP9. This powerful moment symbolizes their unwavering determination to save their crewmate.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most iconic moments in the series, demonstrating the crew's unity and their bond with Robin. Sets up the final confrontation with CP9.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Learns of Blueno's Defeat
keyMoments.description: The CP9 members learn that Blueno, one of their elite members, has been defeated by Luffy. This shocks the organization and raises concerns about the Straw Hats' strength.
keyMoments.significance: First confirmed defeat of a CP9 member, demonstrating the Straw Hats can compete with the World Government's elite assassins.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Assembles on Tower of Justice
keyMoments.description: All CP9 members gather on the Tower of Justice balcony with Spandam, facing the assembled Straw Hats in a dramatic standoff.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the individual matchups between Straw Hats and CP9 members that will follow.
